case_data.name: EEOC v. San Fransisco Newspaper Agency
case_data.plaintiff_description: Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, on behalf of one or more workers.
case_data.summary: In May 1997, the San Francisco office of the EEOC brought this suit against San Francisco Newspaper Agency in the U.S. District Court for the California Northern District. The parties settled in December 1997 during a settlement conference, and the court dismissed the case in June 1998. Because the docket is the only accessible document, there is no more information available pertaining to the nature of the suit or the consent decree.
